text.content: Carlos just got a job at the corner shop.
It was called Tienda La Esperanza.
It was a short walk from his house.
Today was his first day at work.
He arrived early, wearing his new uniform.
His first task was to organize the shelves.
He arranged bags of rice, beans, and snacks.
He also had to clean the counter and check the cash register.
The owner, Don Luis, showed him how to use the scanner.
Carlos took orders, packed groceries, and greeted customers.
At the end of the day, he was tired but happy.
He knew he was learning something valuable.
